atk-s0402a49:2_0: 131. Catutthassa paṭhame upapattipaṭilābhiyānīti yehi anantarā upapattiṁ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a49:2_1: Bhavapaṭilābhiyānīti upapattibhavassa paṭilābhāya paccayāni. Sakadāgāmissāti idaṁ
atk-s0402a49:2_2: appahīnasaṁyojanesu ariyesu uttamakoṭiyā gahitaṁ. Yasmā pana antarāparinibbāyissa
atk-s0402a49:2_3: antarā upapatti natthi, yaṁ pana so tattha jhānaṁ samāpajjati, taṁ kusalattā ‘‘upapattibhavassa
atk-s0402a49:2_4: paccayo’’ teva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati. Tasmāssa ‘‘upapattipaṭilābhiyāni saṁyojanāni pahīnāni,
atk-s0402a49:2_5: bhavapaṭilābhiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnānī’’ti vuttaṁ. Orambhāgiyesu ca appahīnaṁ
atk-s0402a49:2_6: upādāya sakadāgāmissa avisesena ‘‘orambhāgiyāni saṁyojanāni appahīnānī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a49:4: 132. Dutiye yuttappaṭibhāno no muttappaṭibhānoti pañhaṁ kathento yuttameva katheti, sīghaṁ pana na katheti, saṇikameva kathetīti attho. Iminā nayena sabbapadāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a49:6: 133. Tatiye catunnampi puggalānaṁ iminā suttena viseso veditabbo –
atk-s0402a49:7_0: ‘‘Katamo ca puggalo ugghaṭitaññū, yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo
atk-s0402a49:7_1: hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo ugghaṭitaññū. Katamo ca puggalo vipañcitaññū, yassa puggalassa
atk-s0402a49:7_2: vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati puggalo vipañcitaññū.
atk-s0402a49:7_3: Katamo ca puggalo neyyo, yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yonisomanasikaroto
atk-s0402a49:7_4: kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ vuccati
atk-s0402a49:7_5: puggalo neyyo. Katamo ca puggalo padaparamo, yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi
atk-s0402a49:7_6: bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti, ayaṁ
atk-s0402a49:9_0: 134. Catutthe uṭṭhānavīriyeneva divasaṁ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṁ kiñcideva
atk-s0402a49:9_1: labhitvā jīvikaṁ kappeti, taṁ pana uṭṭhānaṁ āgamma kiñci puññaphalaṁ nappaṭilabhati
atk-s0402a49:9_2: , ayaṁ uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī na kammaphalūpajīvī nāma. Cātumahārājike pana deve ādiṁ
atk-s0402a49:9_3: katvā sabbepi devā uṭṭhānavīriyena vinā puññaphalasseva upajīvanato kammaphalūpajīvino
atk-s0402a49:9_4: na uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino nāma. Rājarājamahāmattādayo uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino ca kammaphalūpajīvino
atk-s0402a49:9_5: ca. Nerayikasattā neva uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino na kammaphalūpajīvino. Imasmiṁ sutte
atk-s0402a49:9_6: puññaphalameva kammaphalanti adhippetaṁ, tañca tesaṁ natthi.
atk-s0402a49:11_0: 135. Pañcame paṭhamo andhabālaputhujjano, dutiyo antarantarā kusalakārako lokiyaputhujjano,
atk-s0402a49:11_1: tatiyo sotāpanno, sakadāgāmianāgāminopi eteneva saṅgahitā. Catuttho khīṇāsavo. So
atk-s0402a49:13_0: 136-137. Chaṭṭhe paṭhamo lokiyamahājano, dutiyo sukkhavipassako sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī
atk-s0402a49:13_1: ca, tatiyo anāgāmī. So hi yasmā taṅkhaṇikampi upapattinimittakaṁ jhānaṁ paṭilabhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a49:13_2: tasmā sukkhavipassakopi samādhismiṁ paripūrakārīyeva. Catuttho khīṇāsavoyeva . So
atk-s0402a49:13_3: hi sabbesaṁ sīlādipaccanīkānaṁ pahīnattā sabbattha paripūrakārī nāma. Sattamepi chaṭṭhe
atk-s0402a49:15_0: 138. Aṭṭhame nikaṭṭhakāyoti niggatakāyo. Anikaṭṭhacittoti anupaviṭṭhacitto. Kāyeneva
atk-s0402a49:15_1: gāmato nikkhanto, cittena araññe vasantopi gāmameva paviṭṭhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Iminā
atk-s0402a49:17: 139. Navame asahitanti atthena asaṁyuttaṁ. Na kusalā hotīti na chekā hoti. Sahitāsahitassāti atthanissitassa vā anissitassa vā. Evaṁ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a49:19_0: 140. Dasame atthato pariyādānaṁ gacchatīti aṭṭhakathaṁ pucchito pariyādānaṁ parikkhayaṁ
atk-s0402a49:19_1: gacchati, kathetuṁ na sakkoti. No byañjanatoti byañjanaṁ panassa pavattati na pariyādiyati.
